summary: A documentary that explores the downloading revolution; the kids that created it, the bands and the businesses that were affected by it, and its impact on the world at large.
cast: Henry Rollins|Cindy Margolis|Mike D|Noel Gallagher|Billy Corgan|Shawn Fanning|Chris Blackwell|Sean Parker|Lawrence Lessig|John Perry Barlow|Seymour Stein|Hilary Rosen|Howard Allan Abrams|Samuel Kolb|Don Ienner|Aaron Guadamuz
keywords: rise and fall|redistribution of wealth|recording industry|napster|music industry
title: Downloaded
